description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 吉林省广播电影电视局

zh-cn: 吉林省广播电影电视局
en: Jilin Provincial Administration of Radio, Film and Television
Jilin Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

relationships.target: 吉林省广播电影电视局

description.zh-cn: 任凤霞曾担任吉林省广播电影电视局党组书记、局长。
description.en: Ren Fengxia served as the Party Group Secretary and Director of the Jilin Provincial Administration of Radio, Film and Television.

description.zh-cn: 任凤霞曾担任吉林省政协副主席。
description.en: Ren Fengxia served as the Vice Chairman of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类“长春人”，任凤霞出生于长春市。
description.en: According to the Wikipedia category 'People from Changchun', Ren Fengxia was born in Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类“东北师范大学校友”，任凤霞是东北师范大学的校友。
description.en: According to the Wikipedia category 'Northeast Normal University alumni', Ren Fengxia is an alumna of Northeast Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类“中国共产党党员”，任凤霞是中国共产党的党员。
description.en: According to the Wikipedia category 'Communist Party of China members', Ren Fengxia is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类和导航模板，任凤霞是中国电视艺术家协会的会员，并曾担任其第三届和第四届理事会的理事。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories and navigation templates, Ren Fengxia is a member of the China Television Artists Association and served as a council member of its 3rd and 4th councils.
